text: Okay, now the module structure for the rest of the large order module So we'll be going through one main learning video looking at multiple Large order plays and setups and strategies then there will be five replay drills We'll have a Q&A session to consolidate your learning. We'll be looking at four strategies within the large order play when you when you observe one identify one and then there'll be one key worksheet exercise on how to really consolidate your learning in the live markets and we'll be looking at the optimal market environments in each of those plays and setups and how to deploy the right strategy as you identify these large orders.
